divy2:30: sa kathayati—dārike tvameva kathayasi—sa patnyā putraiścāpyupekṣita iti |

divy2:42: sa kathayati—āryaputra, dūramapi paramapi gatvā dāsyevāham, yadi tu āryaputreṇa sārdhaṁ samāgamo bhavati, evamadāsī bhavāmīti |
divy2:43: tenāvaśyaṁ nirbandhaṁ jñātvā abhihitā—yadā saṁvṛttā ṛtumatī tadā mamārocayiṣyasīti |
divy2:44: sā apareṇa samayena kalyā saṁvṛttā ṛtumatī |
divy2:46: tato bhavena gṛhapatinā tayā sārdhaṁ paricāritam |
divy2:48: yameva divasamāpannasattvā saṁvṛttā tameva divasamupādāya bhavasya gṛhapateḥ sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāśca paripūrṇāḥ |
divy2:49: sā tvaṣṭānāṁ vā navānāṁ māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā |
divy2:50: dārako jāto ’bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśīrṣaḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṁgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ |
divy2:51: yasminneva divase dārako jātaḥ, tasminneva divase bhavasya gṛhapaterbhūyasyā mātrayā sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāḥ paripūrṇāḥ |
divy2:52: tasya jñātayaḥ saṁgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṁśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātamahaṁ kṛtvā pūrvavat yāvatpūrṇeti nāmadheyaṁ vyavasthāpitam |
divy2:53: pūrṇo dārako ’ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dvābhyāmaṁsadhātībhyāṁ datto vistareṇa yāvadāśu vardhate hradasthamiva paṅkajam |
divy2:54: yadā mahān saṁvṛttaḥ, tadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṁkhyāyāṁ gaṇanāyāṁ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṁ ratnaparīkṣāyāṁ hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṁ kumāraparīkṣāyāṁ kumārikāparīkṣāyām |
divy2:55: aṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūddhaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy2:56: tato bhavena gṛhapatinā bhavilādīnāṁ putrāṇām yathānupūrvyā niveśāḥ kṛtāḥ |
divy2:57: te patnībhiḥ sārdhamatīva saṁraktā nivṛttā maṇḍanaparamā vyavasthitāḥ |

divy2:60: sa kathayati—putrakāḥ, na tāvanmayā niveśaḥ kṛto yāvatsuvarṇalakṣaḥ samudānīta iti |

divy2:63: kathaṁ na cintāparo bhaviṣyāmīti? bhavilena ratnakarṇikā pinaddhā |
divy2:64: sa tāmavatāryadārukarṇikāṁ pinahya pratijñāmārūḍhah—na tāvat ratnakarṇikāṁ pinahyāmi yāvat suvarṇalakṣaḥ samupārjita iti |
divy2:67: teṣām yāstāḥ saṁjñā bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandīti tā antarhitāḥ |
divy2:77: pūrṇenāpi tatraiva dharmeṇa nyāyena vyavahāritāḥ sātirekāḥ suvarṇalakṣāḥ samudānītāaḥ |
divy2:78: pūrṇo ’pi pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati—tāta, mamāpi kalyatāmāvārīsamutthitaṁ dravyamiti |
divy2:80: kiṁ tava kalyate? sa kathayati—tāta kalyatām |
divy2:82: kalitam yāvannyāyopārjitasya suvarṇasya mūlyaṁ varjayitvā sātiriktā lakṣāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ |
divy2:83: bhavo gṛhapatiḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ saṁlakṣayati—puṇyamaheśākhyo ’yaṁ sattvo yenehaiva sthiteneyatsuvarṇaṁ samupārjitamiti |
divy2:94: sa kathayati—putrakāḥ, dṛṣṭo vah? tāta dṛṣṭaḥ |
divy2:95: sa gāthāṁ bhāṣate— jvalanti sahitāṅgārā bhrātaraḥ sahitāstathā |
divy2:104: sa tenoktah—putra, na kadācit tvayā pūrṇo moktavyaḥ |
divy2:106: ityuktvā— sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ |
divy2:109: tair nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṁkṛtya mahatā saṁskāreṇa śmaśānaṁ nītvā dhmāpitaḥ |
divy2:110: tataste śokavinodanaṁ kṛtvā kathayanti—yadā asmākaṁ pitā jīvati, tadā tadadhīnāḥ prāṇāḥ |
divy2:113: yannu vayaṁ paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṁ gacchāma iti |
divy2:115: te kathayanti—tvamatraivāvāryāṁ vyāpāraṁ kuru, vayameva gacchāma iti |
divy2:123: yadā te upasthāya prakrāntā bhavanti, tadā tāsāṁ divasaparivyayaṁ dadāti |
divy2:126: tāḥ kathayanti—evaṁ hi teṣāṁ bhavati, yeṣāṁ dāsīputrāḥ kuleṣvaiśvacaryaṁ vaśe vartayantīti |
divy2:127: bhavilapatnyā dārikā abhihitā—tvayā kālaṁ jñātvā gantavyamiti |
divy2:128: sā kālaṁ jñātvā gacchati, śīghraṁ labhate |
divy2:135: yadā tasyā dārikā gatā bhavati, tadā labhyate |
divy2:137: tāḥ saṁjātāmarṣāḥ kathayanti—evaṁ hi teṣāṁ bhavati yeṣāṁ dāsīputrāḥ kulesvaiścaryaṁ vaśe vartayantīti |
divy2:138: yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandī ca sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṁmodamānā mahāsamudrāt saṁsiddhayānapātrā āgatāḥ |
divy2:139: bhavilena patnī pṛṣṭā—bhadre, śobhanaṁ pūrṇena pratipālitā tvamiti? sā kathayati—yathā bhrātrā putreṇa veti |
divy2:140: te anye ’pi svāmibhyāṁ pṛṣṭe kathayatah—evaṁ hi teṣāṁ bhavati, yeṣāṁ dāsīputrāḥ kuleṣvaiścaryaṁ vaśe vartayantīti |
divy2:145: anyābhyāṁ dṛṣṭvā svaputrāḥ preṣitā yāvat kāśikavastrāvārī ghaṭṭitā, phuṭṭakavastrāvārī udghāṭitā |
divy2:148: te dṛṣṭvā svāminoḥ kathayatah—dṛṣṭam yuvābhyāmapareṣāṁ kāśikavastrāṇi dīyante, pareṣāṁ phuṭṭakānīti |
divy2:150: kimetadeva bhaviṣyati? nūnaṁ kāśikavastrāvārī ghaṭṭitā, phuṭṭakavastrāvārī udghāṭiteti |
divy2:157: tābhistaṁ dṛṣṭvā svāminau tathā tathā bhagnau yathā gṛhavibhāgaṁ kartumārabdhau |
divy2:158: tau parasparaṁ saṁjalpaṁ kurutah—sarvathā vinaṣṭā vayam, gṛhaṁ bhājayāmeti |
divy2:162: ekasya gṛhagataṁ kṣetragataṁ ca, ekasyāvārīgataṁ deśāntaragataṁ ca, ekasya pūrṇakaḥ |
divy2:163: yadi jyeṣṭhataro gṛhagataṁ kṣetragataṁ ca grahīṣyati, śaknumo vayamāvārīgatena deśāntaragatena cātmānaṁ saṁdhārayitum |
divy2:164: athāvārīgataṁ deśāntaragataṁ ca grahīṣyati, tathāpi vayaṁ śknumo gṛhagatena kṣetragatena cātmānaṁ saṁdhārayitum, pūrṇakasya ca māryādābandhaṁ kartumiti |
divy2:165: tāvevaṁ saṁjalpaṁ kṛtvā bhavilasya sakāśaṁ gatau |
divy2:167: sa kathayati—suparīkṣitaṁ kartavyam, gṛhabhedikāḥ striyo bhavantīti |
divy2:171: ekasya gṛhagataṁ kṣetragataṁ ca, ekasyāvārīgataṁ deśāntaragataṁ ca, ekasya pūrṇakaḥ |
divy2:172: sa kathayati—pūrṇasya pratyaṁśaṁ nānuprayacchatha? tau kathayatah—dāsīputraḥ saḥ |
divy2:173: kastasya pratyaṁśaṁ dadyāt? api tu sa evāsmābhirbhājitaḥ |
divy2:175: sa saṁlakṣayati—ahaṁ pitrā abhihitah—sarvasvamapi te parityajya pūrṇo grahītavya iti |
divy2:176: gṛhṇāmi pūrṇamiti viditvā kathayati—evaṁ bhavatu mama pūrṇaketi |
divy2:177: yasya gṛhagataṁ kṣetragataṁ ca, sa tvaramāṇo gṛhaṁ gatvā kathayati—jyeṣṭhabhavike nirgaccha |
divy2:181: yasyāvārīgataṁ deśāntaragataṁ ca, so ’pi tvaramāṇa āvārīṁ gatvā kathayati—pūrṇaka avatareti |
divy2:185: yāvat bhavilapatnī pūrṇakena sārdhaṁ jñātigṛhaṁ saṁprasthitā |
divy2:189: sā kathayati—tvayā iyatībhiḥ suvarṇalakṣābhirvyavahṛtam, dārakāṇāṁ pūrvabhikṣikāpi nāsti? pūrṇaḥ kathayati—kimahaṁ jāne yuṣmākaṁ gṛhe īdṛśīyamavasthā bhaviṣyatīti |
divy2:190: yadi mayā jñātamabhaviṣyat, mayā anekāḥ suvarṇalakṣāḥ saṁhāritā abhaviṣyan |
divy2:194: anyatamaśca puruṣaḥ samudravelāpreritānāṁ kāṣṭhānāṁ bhāramādāya śītenābhidruto vepamāna āgacchati |
divy2:195: sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaśca—bhoḥ puruṣa, kasmādevaṁ vepase? sa kathayati—ahamapi na jāne |
divy2:196: mayā cāyaṁ bhāraka utkṣipto bhavati, mama cedṛśī samavasthā |
divy2:200: sa tenābhihitah—bho puruṣa, kiyatā mūlyena dīyate? pañcabhiḥ kārṣāpaṇaśataiḥ |
divy2:201: tena taṁ kāṣṭhabhāraṁ gṛhītvā tadgośīrṣacandanamapanīya vīthīṁ gatvā karapatrikayā catasraḥ khaṇḍikāḥ kṛtāḥ |
divy2:204: uktaṁ ca—enaṁ kāṣṭhabhārakamamuṣmin gṛhe bhavilapatnī tiṣṭhati tatra naya, vaktavyā pūrṇena preṣiteti |
divy2:206: sā urasi prahāraṁ dattvā kathayati—yadyasāvarthātparibhraṣṭaḥ, kiṁ prajñayāpi paribhraṣṭah? pakvamānayeti pācanaṁ preṣitam |
divy2:215: te pūrṇasya sakāśaṁ gatvā kathayanti—tavāsti gośīrṣacandanam? sa āha—asti |
divy2:216: te ūcuh—kiyatā mūlyena dīyate? sa āha—kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa |

divy2:218: rājā saṁlakṣayati—kīdṛśo ’sau yasya gṛhe gośīrṣacandanaṁ nāsti |

divy2:225: sa gośīrṣacandanasya tisro gaṇḍikā vastreṇa pidhāyaikaṁ pāṇinā gṛhītvā rājñaḥ sakāśaṁ gataḥ |
divy2:237: pūrṇaḥ kathayati—yadi me devaḥ parituṣṭo devasya vijate ’paribhūto vaseyamiti |
divy2:238: rājñā amātyānāmājñā dattā—bhavantaḥ, adyāgreṇa kumārāṇāmājñā deyā na tvevaṁ pūrṇasyeti |
divy2:239: yāvanmahāsamudrāt pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni saṁsiddhayānapātrāṇi sūrpārakaṁ nagaramanuprāptāni |
divy2:240: vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah—na kenacidasmākaṁ samastānāṁ nirgatyaikākinā vaṇijāṁ sakāśamupasaṁkramitavyam |
divy2:243: anye kathayanti—kiṁ tasya kṛpaṇasyāsti yaḥ śabdāyata iti |

divy2:247: pṛcchati—bhavataḥ, kimidaṁ dravyamiti? te kathayanti—idaṁ cedaṁ ceti |
divy2:248: kiṁ mūlyam? te kathayanti—sārthavāha, dūramapi paramapi gatvā tvameva praṣṭavyaḥ |
divy2:251: sa kathayati—bhavantastisro lakṣā avadraṁgaṁ gṛhṇīta, mamaitat |

divy2:263: te kathayanti—yattenāvadraṅge dattaṁ tad yūyaṁ mūlye ’pi na dāsyatha |

divy2:273: sa tairāhūyoktah—pūrṇa vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah—na kenacidekākinā grahītavyam |
divy2:275: kasmātte gṛhītam? sa kathayati—bhavantaḥ, yadā yuṣmābhiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtastadā kimahaṁ na śabdito mama bhrātā vā? yuṣmābhireva kriyākāraḥ kṛto yūyameva pālayata |

divy2:281: kathayati rājā—bhavantaḥ, kasyārthe yuṣmābhiḥ pūrṇa ātape vidhāritah? te kathayanti—deva vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛto na kenacidekākinā paṇyaṁ grahītavyamiti |

divy2:284: rājā kathayati—bhavantaḥ, śobhanaṁ pūrṇaḥ kathayati—sa tairvrīḍitairmuktaḥ |
divy2:286: tena vaṇiggrāma āhūyoktah—bhavantaḥ, mamāmukena dravyeṇa prayojanam |
divy2:293: te vaṇiggrāmāḥ sarva eva saṁbhūya tasya niveśanaṁ gatvā dvāri sthitvā tairdūtaḥ preṣitaḥ |
divy2:299: pañcadaśa lakṣāṇi teṣāṁ vaṇijyaṁ dattamavaśiṣṭaṁ svagṛhaṁ praveśitam |
divy2:300: sa saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ śakyamavaśyāyabindunā kumbhaṁ pūrayitum? mahāsamudramavatarāmīti |
divy2:301: tena sūrpārake nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṁ kāritam—śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ saurpārakīyā vaṇijaḥ |
divy2:303: yo yuṣmākamutsahate pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartuṁ sa mahāsamudragamanīyaṁ paṇyaṁ samudānayatviti |
divy2:305: tataḥ pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanah pañcavaṇikśataparivāro mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ |
divy2:310: pūrṇaḥ ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṁsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgata iti |
divy2:311: śrāvasteyā vaṇijaḥ paṇyamādāya sūrpārakaṁ nagaraṁ gatāḥ |
divy2:312: te mārgaśramaṁ prativinodya yena pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhastenopasaṁkrāntāḥ |
divy2:314: sa kathayati—bhavantaḥ, asti kaścidyuṣmābhirdṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudrātsaṁsiddhayānapātrāgataḥ saptamaṁ vāramavataran? te kathayanti—pūrṇa, vayaṁ tvāmuddiśya dūrādāgatāḥ |
divy2:318: te rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye udānāt pārāyaṇāt satyadṛśaḥ sthaviragāthāḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṁ kurvanti |
divy2:322: sa buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṁ śabdaṁ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāni āhṛṣṭāni |
divy2:324: te kathayanti—asti śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulātkeśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṁ pravrajitaḥ |
divy2:327: kutra bhavantaḥ sa bhagavānetarhi viharati? sārthavāha, śrāvstyāṁ jetavane ’nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
divy2:328: sa taṁ hṛdi kṛtvā taiḥ sārdhaṁ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṁsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgataḥ |
divy2:329: bhrātāsya bhavilaḥ saṁlakṣayati—parikhinno ’yaṁ mahāsamudragamanena, niveśo ’sya kartavya iti |
divy2:330: sa tenoktah—bhrātaḥ, kathaya katarasya dhaninaḥ sārthavāhasya vā tavārthāya duhitaraṁ prārthayāmīti |
divy2:333: sa kathayati—yadāsmākaṁ gṛhe vārtā nāsti, tadā na pravrajitaḥ |
divy2:335: pūrṇaḥ kathayati—bhrātaḥ, tadānīṁ na śobhate, idānīṁ tu yuktam |
divy2:340: nyāyopārjitaṁ te prabhūtaṁ dhanamasti, eṣāṁ tu tava bhrātṛrṇāmanyāyoparjitam |
divy2:341: yadyete kathayanti ekadhye vasāmeti, na vastavyam |
divy2:346: tena gatvā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapterārocitam—gṛhapate, pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha udyāne tiṣṭhati gṛhapatiṁ draṣṭukāma iti |
divy2:347: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saṁlakṣayati—nūnaṁ jalayānena khinna idānīṁ sthalayānenāgataḥ |
divy2:351: anāthapiṇḍadaḥ saṁlakṣayati—na mama pratirūpam yadahaṁ pradhānapuruṣamasatkāreṇa praveśayeyamiti |
divy2:352: sa tena mahatā satkāreṇa praveśita udvartitaḥ snāpito bhojitaḥ |
divy2:353: svairālāpeṇāvasthitayoranāthapiṇḍadaḥ pṛcchati—sārthavāha, kimāgamanaprayojanam? apūrveṇa gṛhapate icchāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvamiti |
divy2:354: tato ’nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ pūrvaṁ kāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṁ bāhuṁ prasāryodānamudānayati—aho buddhaḥ |
divy2:357: yatredānīmīdṛśāḥ pradhānapuruṣā vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargamapahāya sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvamiti |
divy2:358: tato ’nāthapiṇḍado gṛḥpatiḥ pūrṇaṁ sārthavāhamādāya yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy2:359: tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣupariṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṁ deśayati |
divy2:361: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—eṣa bhikṣavo ’nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati |
divy2:362: nāsti tathāgatasyaivaṁvidhaḥ prābhṛto yathā vaineyaprābhṛta iti |
divy2:363: tato ’nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṁ kṛtvā pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy2:364: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo ’nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat—ayaṁ bhadanta pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy2:367: tato bhagavān pūrṇaṁ sārthavāhamāmantrayate—ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryamiti |
divy2:368: sa bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍaḥ saṁvṛttaḥ saṁghāṭiprāvṛtaḥ pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśrurvarṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvāsthitaḥ |
divy2:369: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṁghāṭiparītadehaḥ |
divy2:370: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau evaṁ sthito buddhamanorathena (4)|
divy2:373: ekānte sthita āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavantamidamavocat—sādhu me bhagavāṁstathā saṁkṣiptena dharmaṁ deśayatu yathāhaṁ bhagavato ’ntikāt saṁkṣiptena dharmaṁ śrutvaiko vyapakṛṣṭo ’pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vihareyam |
divy2:374: yadarthaṁ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṁ pravrajanti, tadanuttaraṁ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṁ dṛṣṭadharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya pravrajayeyam—kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṁ brahmacaryaṁ kṛtaṁ karaṇīyaṁ nāparamasmādbhavaṁ prajānāmīti |
divy2:375: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṁ pūrṇamidamavocat—sādhu pūrṇa, sādhu khalu tvaṁ pūrṇa yastvamevaṁ vadasi—sādhu me bhagavāṁstathā saṁkṣiptena dharmaṁ deśayatu pūrvavadyāvannāparamasmād bhavaṁ prajānāmīti |
divy2:376: tena hi pūrṇa śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye |
divy2:378: santi pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭakāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni kāmopasaṁhitāni rañjanīyāni |
divy2:379: tāni cedbhikṣurdṛṣṭvābhinandati abhivadāti adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati, tāni abhinandato ’bhivadato ’dhyavasato ’dhyavasāya tiṣṭhata ānandī bhavati |
divy2:384: santi pūrṇa śrotravijñeyāḥ śabdāḥ, ghrāṇavijñeyā gandhāḥ, jihvāvijñeyā rasāḥ, kāyavijñeyāni spraṣṭavyāni, manovijñeyā dharmā iṣṭāḥ kāntāḥ priyā manāpāḥ kāmopasaṁhitā rañjanīyāḥ |
divy2:386: santi tu pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni pūrvavad yavat śuklapakṣeṇāntike nirvāṇasyeti ucyate |
divy2:387: anena tvaṁ pūrṇa mayā saṁkṣiptenāvavādena coditaḥ |
divy2:388: kutrecchasi vastuṁ kutrecchasi vāsaṁ kalpayitum? anenāhaṁ bhadanta bhagavatā saṁkṣiptenāvavādena codita icchāmi śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṁ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsaṁ kalpayitum |
divy2:389: caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntikā manuṣyā rabhasāḥ karkaśā ākrośakā roṣakāḥ paribhāṣakāḥ |
divy2:390: sacet tvāṁ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā saṁmukhaṁ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante, tasya te kathaṁ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṁ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ saṁmukhaṁ pāpikayā asātyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante, tasya mamaivaṁ bhaviṣyati—bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, snigdhakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, ye māṁ saṁmukhaṁ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrośanti roṣayanti paribhāṣante |
divy2:391: no tu pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharantīti |
divy2:392: caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavat yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ |
divy2:393: sacet tvāṁ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti, tasya te kathaṁ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṁ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti, tasya mamaivaṁ bhaviṣyati—bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, snehakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, ye māṁ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharanti, no tu daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharantīti |
divy2:394: caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavad yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ |
divy2:395: sacet tvāṁ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti, tasya te kathaṁ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṁ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti, tasya mamaivaṁ bhaviṣyati—bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, snehakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, ye māṁ daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharanti, no tu sarveṇa sarvaṁ jīvitād vyaparopayanti |
divy2:396: caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ |
divy2:397: sacet tvāṁ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṁ jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyanti, tasya te kathaṁ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṁ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṁ jīvitād vyaparoyiṣyanti, tasya me evaṁ bhaviṣyati—santi bhagavataḥ śrāvakā ye anena pūtikāyenārdīyamānā jehrīyante, vijugupsamānāḥ śastramapi ādhārayanti, viṣamapi bhikṣayanti, rajjvā baddhā api mriyante, prapātādapi prapatantyapi |
divy2:398: bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyakāḥ, snehakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, ye māmasmāt pūtikalevarādalpakṛcchreṇa parimocayantīti |
divy2:399: sādhu sādhu pūrṇa, śakyastvaṁ pūrṇa anena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṁ śroṇāparāntakeṣu vāsaṁ kalpayitum |
divy2:400: gaccha tvaṁ pūrṇa, mukto mocaya, tīrṇastāraya, āśvasta āśvasaya, parinirvṛtaḥ parinirvāpayeti |
divy2:402: athāyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy2:403: athāyuṣmān pūrṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
divy2:404: śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrāntaḥ |
divy2:405: yathāparibhuktaśayanāsanaṁ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaram yena śroṇāparāntakā janapadāstena cārikāṁ carañ śroṇāparāntakāñ janapadānanuprāptaḥ |
divy2:406: athāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śroṇāparāntakaṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
divy2:409: sa saṁlakṣayati—amaṅgalo ’yaṁ muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako mayā dṛṣṭa iti viditvā ā karṇād dhanuḥ pūrayitvā yenāyuṣmān pūrṇastena pradhāvitaḥ |
divy2:411: dṛṣṭvā cettarāsaṅgaṁ vivartya kathayati—bhadramukha, asya duṣpūrasyārthe praviśāmi, atra prahareti |
divy2:412: gāthāṁ ca bhāṣate— yasyārthe gahane caranti vihagā gacchanti bandhaṁ mṛgāḥ saṁgrāme śaraśaktatomaradharā naśyantyajasraṁ narāḥ |
divy2:413: dīnā durdinacāriṇaśca kṛpaṇā matsyā grasantyāyasam asyārthe udarasya pāpakalile dūrādihābhyāgataḥ (5)|
divy2:416: sa saṁlakṣayati—ayaṁ pravrajita īdṛśena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ |
divy2:418: tato ’syāyuṣmatā pūrṇena dharmo deśyitaḥ, śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeśeṣu ca pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ |
divy2:421: tasyaiva ca trimāsasyātyayāt tisro vidyāḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtāḥ |
divy2:423: traidhātukavītarāgo yāvat sendropendrāṇāṁ devānāṁ pūjyo mānyo ’bhivādyaśca saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy2:425: yāvadapareṇa samayena dārukarṇibhrātrorbhogāstanutvaṁ parikṣayaṁ paryādānaṁ gatāḥ |
divy2:431: tau kathayatah—śrīrvā bhavatu kālakarṇī vā, āgaccha ekadhye prativasāmaḥ |
divy2:434: tau kathayatah—tena dāsīputreṇa mahāsamudramavatīryāvatīrya bhogāḥ samudānītā yena tvaṁ bhuñjāno vikatthase |
divy2:440: karṇadhāraḥ kathayati—bhavantaḥ, yattat śrūyate gośīrṣacandanavanamiti, idaṁ tat |
divy2:442: tena khalu samayena gośīrṣacandanavanaṁ maheśvarasya yakṣasya parigraho ’bhūt |
divy2:445: adrākṣīdapriyākhyo yo yakṣo gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahataḥ |
divy2:446: dṛṣṭvā ca yena maheśvaro yakṣaḥ, tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy2:447: upasaṁkramya maheśvaram yakṣamidamavocat—yat khalu grāmaṇīrjānīyā gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahanti |
divy2:448: yatte kṛtyaṁ vā karaṇīyaṁ vā tatkuruṣveti |
divy2:449: atha maheśvaro yakṣo yakṣāṇāṁ samitimasamitiṁ kṛtvā saṁjātāmarṣo mahāntaṁ kālikāvātabhayaṁ saṁjanya yena gośīrṣacandanavanaṁ tena saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy2:450: karṇadhāreṇārocitam—śṛṇvantu bhavanto jāmbudvīpakā vaṇijah—yattat śrūyate mahākālikāvātabhayamiti, idaṁ tat |
divy2:451: kiṁ manyadhvamiti? tataste vaṇijo bhītāstrastāḥ saṁvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpā devatāyācanaṁ kartumārabdhāḥ |
divy2:453: vyasanamatibhayaṁ vayaṁ prapannā vigatabhayā hi bhavantu no ’dya nāthāḥ (6)|
divy2:458: kimarthamalpotsukastiṣṭhasīti? sa kathayati—bhavantaḥ, ahaṁ bhrātrā abhihitah—mahāsamudro ’lpāsvādo bahvādīnavaḥ |
divy2:465: tairekasvareṇa sarvairevaṁ nādo muktah—namastasmai āryāya pūrṇāya, namo namastasmai āryāya pūrṇāyeti |
divy2:466: atha yā devatā āyuṣmatī pūrṇe ’bhiprasannā, sā yenāyuṣmān pūrṇastenopasaṁkrāntā |
divy2:467: upasaṁkramya āyuṣmantaṁ pūrṇamidamavocat—ārya, bhrātā te kṛcchrasaṁkaṭasambādhaprāptaḥ, samanvāhareti |
divy2:469: tata āyuṣmān pūrṇastadrūpaṁ samādhiṁ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte śroṇāparāntake ’ntarhito mahāsamudre vahanasīmāyāṁ paryaṅkaṁ baddhvā avasthitaḥ |
divy2:471: atha maheśvaro yakṣaḥ saṁlakṣayati—pūrvam yat kiṁcidvahanaṁ kālikāvātena spṛśyate, tattūlapicuvata kṣipyate viśīryate ca |
divy2:472: idānīṁ ko yogo yena kālikāvātah sumerupratyāhata iva pratinivṛttah? sa itaścāmutaśca pratyavekṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati āyuṣmantaṁ pūrṇaṁ vahanasīmāyāṁ paryaṅkaṁ baddhvāvasthitam |
divy2:473: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ kathayati—ārya pūrṇa, kiṁ viheṭhayasīti? āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kathayati—jarādharmo ’ham |
divy2:474: kiṁ māmeva viheṭhayasi? yadi mayedṛśā guṇagaṇā nādhigatāḥ syurbhrātā me tvayā nāmāvaśeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt |
divy2:475: maheśvaro yakṣaḥ kathayati—ārya idaṁ gośīrṣacandanavanaṁ rājñaścakaravartino ’rthāya dhāryate |
divy2:476: kiṁ manyase grāmaṇīḥ kiṁ varaṁ rājā cakravartī uta tathagato ’rhan samyaksambuddha? kim ārya bhagavāṁl loka utpannah? utpannaḥ |
divy2:478: tataste vaṇijo gatapratyāgataprāṇā āyuṣmati pūrṇe cittamabhiprasādya tadvahanaṁ gośīrṣacandanasya pūrayitvā saṁprasthitāḥ |
divy2:481: tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhrātuḥ kathayati—yasya nāṁnā vahanaṁ saṁsiddhayānapātramāgacchati, tattasya gamyaṁ bhavati |
divy2:483: ahamanena gośīrṣacandanena bhagavato ’rthāya candanamālaṁ prāsādaṁ kārayāmīti |
divy2:484: tena teṣāṁ vaṇijāṁ ratnaiḥ saṁvibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ |
divy2:485: tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo gośīrṣacandanena prāsādaṁ māpayitumārabdhaḥ |
divy2:486: tena śilpānāhūyoktāh—bhavantaḥ, kiṁ divase divase pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhṇīdhvamāhosvit gośīrṣacandanacūrṇasya biḍālapadam? te kathayanti—ārya gośīrṣacandanacūrṇasya biḍālapadam |
divy2:487: yāvat alpīyasā kālena candanamālaḥ prāsādaḥ kṛtaḥ |
divy2:490: yattatra saṁkalikā cūrṇaṁ cāvaśiṣṭam, tat piṣṭvā tatraiva pralepo dattaḥ |
divy2:491: te ca bhrātara parasparaṁ sarve kṣamitā uktāśca—buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghamupanimantrya bhojayata |
divy2:497: upasaṁkramya śirasā praṇāmaṁ kṛtvā kathayanti—deva, icchāmo vayaṁ buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghamupanimantrya bhojayitum |
divy2:502: tata āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ śaraṇapṛṣṭhamabhiruhya jetavanābhimukhaṁ sthitvā ubhe jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyāṁ pratiṣṭhāpya puṣpāṇi kṣiptvā dhūpaṁ saṁcārya ārāmikena ca sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṁ grāhayitvā ārādhituṁ pravṛttaḥ |
divy2:504: anāthabhūtān prasamīkṣya sādho kṛtvā kṛpāmāgamanaṁ kuruṣva (8)|
divy2:506: tatastāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṁ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṁ ca devatānubhāvenopari puṣpamaṇḍapaṁ kṛtvā jetavane gatvā sthitāni dūupo ’bhrakūṭavadudakaṁ vaidūryaśalākāvat |
divy2:508: sa kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṁ papraccha—kuto bhagavan nimantraṇamāgatam? sūrpārakāt ānanda nagarāt |
divy2:509: kiyaddūre bhadanta sūrpārakaṁ nagaram? sātirekam ānanda yojanaśatam |
divy2:510: gacchāmah? ānanda, bhikṣūnārocaya—yo yuṣmākamutsahate śvaḥ sūrpārakaṁ nagaraṁ gatvā bhoktum, sa śalākāṁ gṛhṇātu iti |
divy2:511: evaṁ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya śalākāṁ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitaḥ |
divy2:514: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakaḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāvimuktas tasyāmeva pariṣadi saṁniṣaṇṇo ’bhūt |
divy2:520: ṛddhibhiryatra gantavyaṁ tūṣṇī tvaṁ bhava pūrṇaka (10)|
divy2:525: tasyaitadabhavat—yena mayā sakalaṁ kleśagaṇaṁ vāntaṁ charditaṁ tyaktaṁ pratiniḥsṛṣṭam, so ’haṁ tīrthikasādhāraṇāyām ṛddhyāṁ viṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy2:526: tena vīryamāsthāya ṛddhimutpādya yāvadāyuṣmānānandas tṛtīyasthavirasya śalākāṁ na dadāti, tāvat tena gajabhujasadṛśaṁ bāhumabhiprasārya śalākā gṛhītā |
divy2:527: tato gāthāṁ bhāṣate— vapuṣmattayā śrutena vā na balātkāraguṇaiśca gautama |

divy2:539: tataḥ sūrpārakarājñā sūrpārakanagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṁ vyavasthāpitaṁ candanavāripariṣiktaṁ nānāvidhasurabhidhūpaghaṭikāsamalaṁkṛtamāmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṁ nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇaṁ ramaṇīyam |

divy2:545: tān dṛṣṭvā rājā kathayati—bhadanta pūrṇa, kiṁ bhagavānāgatah? āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kathayati—mahārāja patracārikā haritacārikā bhājanacārikāścaite, na tāvat bhagavān |

divy2:548: athānyatamopāsakastasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ bhāṣate— siṁhavyāghragajāśvanāgavṛṣabhānāśritya kecit śubhān kecidratnavimānaparvatatarūṁścitrān rathāṁścojjvalān |
divy2:549: anye toyadharā ivāmbaratale vidyullatālaṁkṛtā ṛddhyā devapurīmiva pramuditā gantuṁ samabhyudyatāḥ (13)|
divy2:554: tato bhagavān bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṁ praviśya ṛjuṁ kāyaṁ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṁ smṛtimupasthāpya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy2:555: yāvad bhagavatā gandhakuṭyāṁ sābhisaṁskāraṁ pādo nyastaḥ, ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātah—iyaṁ mahāpṛthivī calati saṁcalati saṁpracalati |
divy2:563: rājā āyuṣmantaṁ pūrṇaṁ pṛcchati—ārya pūrṇa, kimetat? sa kathayati—mahārāja, bhagavatā gandhakuṭyāṁ sābhisaṁskāraḥ pādo nyastaḥ, tena ṣaṭvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ |
divy2:564: tato bhagavatā kanakamarīcivarṇaprabhā utsṛṣṭā yayā jambudvīpo vilīnakanakāvabhāsaḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy2:565: punarapi rājā vismayotphullalocanaḥ pṛcchati—ārya pūrṇa, idaṁ kim? sa kathayati—mahārāja bhagavatā kanakamarīcivarṇaprabhā utsṛṣṭeti |
divy2:567: tato bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāraḥ pañcabhirarhacchāntaiḥ sārdhaṁ sūrpārakābhimukhaḥ saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy2:568: atha vā jetavananivāsinī devatā, sā bakulaśākhāṁ gṛhītvā bhagavataśchāyāṁ kurvantī pṛṣṭataḥ saṁprasthitā |
divy2:569: tasyā bhagavatā āśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhakī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṁ śrutvā tayā devatayā viṁśatiśikharasamudgataṁ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṁ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy2:571: adrākṣustā buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṁkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṁ vyāmaprabhālaṁkṛtaṁ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṁ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṁ samantato bhadrakam |
divy2:573: dharmataiṣā—na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścittasya kalyatāṁ janayati aputrasya ca putralābho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṁ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko yathopacitakuśalamūlahetukasya sattvasya tatprathamato buddhadarśanam |
divy2:574: tato bhagavāṁstāsāṁ vinayakālamavekṣya purastād bhikṣusaṁghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy2:575: tā api bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy2:576: tato bhagavatā tāsāmāśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā yāvat srotāapattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |

divy2:578: ucchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrāḥ, laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitānyapāyadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitā vayaṁ devamanuṣyeṣu atikrāntātikrāntāḥ |

divy2:595: tataste ṛṣayaḥ kare kapolaṁ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ |

divy2:598: bhagavānāha—kim? te kathayanti—bhagavan, puṣpaphalasalilasampannamāśramapadaṁ vinaṣṭam yathāpaurāṇaṁ bhavatu |
divy2:600: tato bhagavatā ṛddhiḥ prasrabdhā, yathāpaurāṇaṁ saṁvṛttam |
divy2:602: tato bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṁ śrutvā taiḥ pañcabhirṛṣiśatairanāgāmiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, ṛddhiścābhinirhṛtā |
divy2:603: tato yena bhagavāṁstenāñjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan—labhema vayaṁ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy2:605: tataste bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitāh—eta bhikṣavaścarata brahmacaryamiti |
divy2:606: bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ saṁghāṭiprāvṛtāḥ pātrakaravyagrahastāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravo varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathena avasthitāḥ |
divy2:607: ehīti coktā hi tathāgatena muṇḍāśca saṁghāṭiparītadehāḥ |
divy2:608: sadyaḥ praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṁ sthitā buddhamanorathena (15)|

divy2:612: tato bhagavān pañcabhirṛṣiśataiḥ pūrvakaiśca pañcabhirbhikṣuḥśatairardhacandrākāropagūḍhastat eva ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā prakrānto ’nupūrveṇa musalakaṁ parvatamanuprāptaḥ |
divy2:613: tena khalu samayena musalake parvate vakkalī nāma ṛṣiḥ prativasati |
divy2:614: adrākṣīt sa ṛṣirbhagavantaṁ dūrādeva dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṁkṛtaṁ pūrvavat yāvat samantato bhadrakam |
divy2:622: tato ’sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṁ śrutvā vakkalinā anāgāmiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, ṛddhiścābhinirhṛtā |
divy2:623: tato bhagavantamidamavocat—labheyāhaṁ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvaṁ pūrvavat yāvat bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā pravrājito yāvadevaṁ sthito buddhamanorathena |
divy2:625: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—eṣo ’gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṁ mama śraddhādhimuktānām yaduta vakkalī bhikṣuriti |
divy2:626: tato bhagavān bhikṣusahasraparivṛto vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi kurvan sūrpārakaṁ nagaramanuprāptaḥ |
divy2:627: bhagvān saṁlakṣayati—yadi ekena dvāreṇa praviśāmi, apareṣāṁ bhaviṣyati anyathātvam |

divy2:630: tataḥ sūrpārakādhipatī rājā āyuṣmān pūrṇo dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī te ca saptadaśa putrāḥ svakasvakena parivāreṇa yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntāḥ, anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi |
divy2:631: tato bhagavānanekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrairanugamyamāno yena candanamālaḥ prāsādas tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |

divy2:634: bhagavān saṁlakṣayati—yadi candanamālaḥ prāsādo bhetsyate, dātṛrṇāṁ puṇyāntarāyo bhaviṣyati |
divy2:637: tato bhagavatā tasyāḥ pariṣad āśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṁ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrairmahān viśeṣo ’dhigataḥ |
divy2:638: kaiścinmokṣabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni utpāditāni, kaiścinnirvedhabhāgīyāni, kaiścit srotāpattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam, kaiścidanāgāmiphalam, kaiścit sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiścit śrāvakabodhau cittānyutpāditāni, kaiścit pratyekabodhau, kaiścidanuttarāyāṁ samyaksambodhau cittānyutpāditāni |
divy2:639: yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhaniṁnā dharmapravaṇā saṁghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā |
divy2:641: atha dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī ca praṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ samudānīya āsanāni prajñāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayanti—samayo bhadanta, sajjaṁ bhaktam yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālam manyata iti |
divy2:642: tena khalu samayena kṛṣṇagautamakau nāgarājau mahāsamudre prativasataḥ |
divy2:643: tau saṁlakṣayatah—bhagavān sūrpārake nagare dharmaṁ deśayati |
divy2:645: tatastau pañcanāgaśataparivārau pañcanadīśatāni saṁjanya sūrpārakaṁ nagaraṁ saṁprasthitau |
divy2:647: bhagavān saṁlakṣayati—imau kṛṣṇagautamau nāgarājau yadi sūrpārakaṁ nagaramāgamiṣyataḥ, agocarīkariṣyataḥ |
divy2:649: tatkasya hetoh? pañca me maudgalyāyana ātyayikapiṇḍapātāḥ |

divy2:654: tau kathayatah—tādṛśena bhadanta prasādena vayamāgatā yanna śakyamasmābhiḥ kuntapipīlikasyāpi prāṇinaḥ pīḍāmutpādayituṁ prāgeva sūrpārakanagaranivāsino janakāyasyeti |
divy2:655: tato bhagavatā kṛṣṇagautamakayor nāgarājayostādṛśo dharmo yaṁ śrutvā buddhaṁ śaraṇaṁ gatau, dharmaṁ saṁghaṁ ca śaraṇaṁ gatau, śikṣāpadāni ca gṛhītāni |
divy2:657: ekaiko nāgaḥ saṁlakṣayati—aho bata bhagavān mama pānīyaṁ pibatu iti |
divy2:658: bhagavān saṁlakṣayti—yadi ekasyeiva pānīyaṁ pāsyāmi, eṣāṁ bhaviṣyati anyathātvam |
divy2:660: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantaṁ mahāmaudgalyāyanamāmantrayate—gaccha maudgalyāyana, yatra pañcānāṁ nadīśatānāṁ saṁbhedaḥ, tasmādudakasya pātrapūramānaya |
divy2:661: evaṁ bhadanteti āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yatra pañcānāṁ nadīśatānāṁ saṁbhedastatrodakasya pātrapūramādāya yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy2:664: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ saṁlakṣayati—pūrvamuktaṁ bhagavatā—duṣkarakārakau hi bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau āpyāyakau poṣakau saṁvardhakau stanyasya dātārau citrasya jambudvīpasya darśayitārau |
divy2:665: ekenāṁśena putro mātaraṁ dvitīyena pitaraṁ pūrṇavarṣaśataṁ paricaret, yadvā asyāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ maṇayo muktā vaidūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvarta iti, evamrūpe vā vividhaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpayat, neyatā putreṇa mātāpitaroḥ kṛtaṁ vā syādupakṛtaṁ vā |

divy2:667: mayā ca mātur na kaścidupakāraḥ kṛtaḥ |

divy2:672: yannvahametamarthaṁ bhagavato nivedayeyamiti bhagavantamidamavocat—uktaṁ bhadanta bhagavatā pūrvam—duṣkarakārakau hi bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau iti |
divy2:673: tanmama mātā marīcike lokadhātau upapannā, sā ca bhagavato vineyā |
divy2:675: bhagavān kathayati—maudgalyāyana, kasya ṛddhyā gacchāmah? bhagavan madīyayā |

divy2:679: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ sasambhramāt tatsakāśamupasaṁkramya kathayati—cirādbata putrakaṁ paśyāmīti |
divy2:682: kathamasya mātā bhavatīti? āyuṣmān maudgalyāyanaḥ kathayati—bhavantaḥ, mama ime skandhā anyāḥ saṁvṛddhāḥ |

divy2:697: atha sā bhadrakanyā bhagavantamāyuṣmantaṁ ca mahāmaudgalyāyanaṁ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṁ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṁ saṁtarpya saṁpravārya bhagavantaṁ bhuktavantaṁ viditvā dhātahastamapanītapātraṁ nīcataramāsanaṁ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
divy2:699: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pātragrāhakaḥ pātraṁ niryātayati |
divy2:705: maudgalyāyanastato vismayāvarjitamatiḥ kathayati—kiṁ nāmeyaṁ bhagavann ṛddhih? manojavā maudgalyāyana |
divy2:706: na mayā bhadanta vijñātamevaṁ gambhīramevaṁ gambhīrā buddhadharmā iti |
divy2:707: yadi vijñātamabhaviṣyat, tilaśo ’pi me saṁcūrṇitaśarīreṇānuttarāyāḥ samyaksambodheścittaṁ vyāvartitamabhaviṣyat |
divy2:710: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṁśayajātāḥ sarvasaṁśayacchettāraṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ papracchuh—kiṁ bhadanta āyuṣmatā pūrṇena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ, kiṁ karma kṛtam yena dāsyāḥ kukṣau upapannaḥ, pravrajya ca sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam? bhagavānāha—pūrṇena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitāani avaśyambhāvīni |
divy2:712: ko ’nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca |
divy2:714: sāmagrīṁ prāpya kālaṁ ca phalanti khalu dehinām (19)|
divy2:715: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣavo ’sminneva bhadrakalpe viṁśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṁ kāśyapo nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṁ manuṣyāṇāṁ ca |
divy2:724: tena tīvreṇa paryavasthānena kharavākkarma niścāritam—kasya dāsīputrasyopadhivāra iti |
divy2:729: yadā asya paryavasthānaṁ vigataṁ tadā tasya sakāśamupasaṁkramya kathayati—jānīṣe tvaṁ ko ’hamiti? sa kathayati—jāne tvaṁ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajito ’hamapīti |
divy2:730: sa kathayati—yadyapyevaṁ tathāpi tu yanmayā pravrajya caraṇīyaṁ tatkṛtamahaṁ sakalabandhanābaddhaḥ |
divy2:735: yattena naraka upapadya dāsīputreṇa bhavitavyam, tannarake nopapannaḥ |
divy2:736: pañca tu janmaśatāni dāsyāḥ kukṣau upapannaḥ |
divy2:737: yāvadetarhyapi carame bhave dāsyā eva kukṣau upapannaḥ |
divy2:738: yat saṁghasyopasthānaṁ kṛtam, tenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ |
divy2:739: yattatra paṭhitaṁ svādhyāyitaṁ skandhakauśalaṁ ca kṛtam, tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy2:740: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṁ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānāṁ karmaṇāmekāntaśuklo vipākaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṁ vyatimiśraḥ |
divy2:741: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
